definition: (completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
"vertical stroke with hook" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 6)/see also 豎鉤|竖钩[shu4 gou1]
in order to/for the purpose of/so as to
no thanks (used to politely but informally decline)
no thanks (used to politely but informally decline)
to be finished/to be done for/ruined/gone to the dogs/oh no
let it be/let it pass/forget about it

sentences.english: It was tight. so ti lasted a long time .
sentences.chinese: 两队不分胜负，所以持续了很长一段时间。

sentences.english: The lesions will "bleach out" and become clean wounds that will heal after a molt.
sentences.chinese: 病变会“漂白了”，成为清洁伤口愈合后，将蜕皮。

sentences.english: How many offerings are listed in these first seven chapters?
sentences.chinese: 在利未记的头七章总共列出了多少种献祭？

sentences.english: I closed the window. I combed his long, black hair from his forehead.
sentences.chinese: 我关上窗，为他梳理了额头长长的黑发。

sentences.english: So what happens in the very likely event they find more tainted products?
sentences.chinese: 那么，如果在整治中发现了更加有害的产品呢？

sentences.english: He pillaged the country of its treasures and of its best people.
sentences.chinese: 他掠夺了这个国家的财富和百姓中的精英。

sentences.english: The pity of it is that an intelligent man appears to have been seduced by the sound of his own voice.
sentences.chinese: 不幸的是，这位智者似乎被自己的声音误导了。

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我们坐立不安了好几个小时，等着裁判们决定获胜者。

sentences.english: Who cut the strings, so Duanchang impact of the song.
sentences.chinese: 是谁剪断了琴弦，弹着如此断肠的曲。

sentences.english: "I'm so glad to see you, " said Carrie, pleased and yet nonplussed.
sentences.chinese: “看见你我太高兴了，”嘉莉说，既高兴又为难。

sentences.english: LX, do you see in the Internet.
sentences.chinese: 楼下的，又看见你在上网了。

sentences.english: In our consulting practice, we reverse the procedure.
sentences.chinese: 在我们的咨询实践中，我们改变了程序。

sentences.english: In the latter period, they were armed with Winchester rifles, clubs and knives.
sentences.chinese: 在后阶段，她们还配备了连发枪以及军棍和军刀。

sentences.english: Blaine stopped to chat with a friend and Guiteau saw his chance.
sentences.chinese: 布莱恩停下来跟一位朋友聊天，吉特奥看到了机会。

sentences.english: I screamed in pain as the knife cut the surface layer of my skin.
sentences.chinese: 我的皮肤被割开了，我痛苦的嘶叫着。

sentences.english: He won a few headers and calmed things down.
sentences.chinese: 赢得了几次头球争顶并且使情况稳定下来。

definition: also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)

at once/right away/only/just (emphasis)/as early as/already/as soon as/then/in that case/as many as/even if/to approach/to move towards/to undertake/to engage in/to suffer/subjected to/to accomplish/to take advantage of/to go with (of foods)/with regard to/concerning
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
(once) again/also/both... and.../and yet/(used for emphasis) anyway
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
(located) at/(to be) in/to exist/in the middle of doing sth/(indicating an action in progress)
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
he or him/(used for either sex when the sex is unknown or unimportant)/(used before sb's name for emphasis)/(used as a meaningless mock object)/other/another
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
